name: MVPAffiliate
author: Peter Smulovics

sections.description:
MVPAffiliate is a WordPress plugin that provides an easy way to attach your Contributor ID to Microsoft affiliate links.

License

GPL2
sections.installation:
1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  2. Go into your settings, which should have a new section for your MVPPlugin settings
  3. Insert your MVP ID as the prompt explains and save
  4. Enjoy!
sections.changelog:
1.1 Added support for ? vs & in the query string, fixed URL match to be more greedy
1.0 Initial version

short_description: Modifies microsoft affiliate links in the content by adding your MVP content creator parameter to the query string
description:
